header: The Lord Will Never Leave Israel

verse: This is what the Lord says:

The Lord says, “The ·time is [days are] coming when this city [Jerusalem] will be rebuilt for me—everything from the Tower of Hananel [Neh. 3:1; 12:39; Zech. 14:10] to the Corner Gate [2 Kin. 14:13; 2 Chr. 25:23; 26:9; Zech. 14:10].
The measuring line will stretch from ·the Corner Gate [before it] straight to the hill of Gareb. Then it will turn to the place named Goah.

The whole valley where dead bodies and ashes are thrown [the Hinnom; ch. 19], and all the terraces out to the Kidron Valley on the east as far as the corner of the Horse Gate [2 Chr. 23:15; Neh. 3:28]—all that area will be holy to the Lord. It [Jerusalem] will never again be torn down or destroyed [1:10].”
